always-revalidate.help: Enable/disable revalidation of requested cached objects, which have content on the server, before serving it to the client.
always-revalidate.name: always-revalidate

options.help: Enable revalidation of requested cached objects.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable revalidation of requested cached objects.
options.name: disable

cache-by-default.help: Enable/disable caching content that lacks explicit caching policies from the server.
cache-by-default.name: cache-by-default

options.help: Enable caching content that lacks explicit caching policies.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable caching content that lacks explicit caching policies.
options.name: disable

cache-cookie.help: Enable/disable caching cookies. Since cookies contain information for or about individual users, they not usually cached.
cache-cookie.name: cache-cookie

options.help: Cache cookies.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not cache cookies.
options.name: disable

cache-expired.help: Enable/disable caching type-1 objects that are already expired on arrival.
cache-expired.name: cache-expired

options.help: Enable setting.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable setting.
options.name: disable

default-ttl.help: Default object expiry time (default = 1440 min (1 day); maximum = 5256000 min (10 years)). This only applies to those objects that do not have an expiry time set by the web server.
default-ttl.name: default-ttl

options.help: Enable external Web caching.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable external Web caching.
options.name: disable

fresh-factor.help: Frequency that the server is checked to see if any objects have expired (1 - 100, default = 100). The higher the fresh factor, the less often the checks occur.
fresh-factor.name: fresh-factor

host-validate.help: Enable/disable validating "Host:" with original server IP.
host-validate.name: host-validate

options.help: Enable validating "Host:" with original server IP.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable validating "Host:" with original server IP.
options.name: disable

ignore-conditional.help: Enable/disable controlling the behavior of cache-control HTTP 1.1 header values.
ignore-conditional.name: ignore-conditional

options.help: Enable ignoring cache-control HTTP 1.1 header values.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable ignoring cache-control HTTP 1.1 header values.
options.name: disable

ignore-ie-reload.help: Enable/disable ignoring the PNC-interpretation of Internet Explorer's Accept: / header.
ignore-ie-reload.name: ignore-ie-reload

options.help: Enable Enable/disable ignoring the PNC-interpretation of Internet Explorer's Accept: / header.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable Enable/disable ignoring the PNC-interpretation of Internet Explorer's Accept: / header.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable ignoring the if-modified-since (IMS) header.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable ignoring the if-modified-since (IMS) header.
options.name: disable

ignore-pnc.help: Enable/disable ignoring the pragma no-cache (PNC) header.
ignore-pnc.name: ignore-pnc

options.help: Enable ignoring the pragma no-cache (PNC) header.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable ignoring the pragma no-cache (PNC) header.
options.name: disable

max-object-size.help: Maximum cacheable object size in kB (1 - 2147483 kb (2GB). All objects that exceed this are delivered to the client but not stored in the web cache.
max-object-size.name: max-object-size

max-ttl.help: Maximum time an object can stay in the web cache without checking to see if it has expired on the server (default = 7200 min (5 days); maximum = 5256000 min (10 years)).
max-ttl.name: max-ttl

min-ttl.help: Minimum time an object can stay in the web cache without checking to see if it has expired on the server (default = 5 min; maximum = 5256000 (10 years)).
min-ttl.name: min-ttl

neg-resp-time.help: Time in minutes to cache negative responses or errors (0 - 4294967295, default = 0  which means negative responses are not cached).
neg-resp-time.name: neg-resp-time

reval-pnc.help: Enable/disable revalidation of pragma-no-cache (PNC) to address bandwidth concerns.
reval-pnc.name: reval-pnc

options.help: Enable revalidation of pragma-no-cache (PNC).
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable revalidation of pragma-no-cache (PNC).
options.name: disable
